<<<<<<< HEAD
Of the nature of faith. A sermon, / by Barten Holyday, Doctor of Divinity. Holyday, Barton, 1593-1661.
[4], 34, [2] p.
Printed by S.G. for W. Lee, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Turks Head in Fleetstreet, over against Fetter-lane end., London, : 1654.
With final errata leaf. Annotation on Thomason copy: "September. 5th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
